actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt buses and predominantly in public passenger transportation service from the manufacturer's excise tax.

summary.text: Exempts buses used predominantly in public passenger transportation service from the manufacturer's excise tax presently imposed under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt buses and predominantly in public passenger transportation service from the manufacturer's excise tax.
